acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused is absent with step taken by his learned counsel. PWs present but couldn&#039t be examined due to absence of the accused person.
Accused Borsing Kathar is absent with step taken by his learned counsel. Issue summon to PWs.
Accused Borsing Kathar is absent with step taken by his learned counsel.Pws present but couln&#039t be examined due to non-avalability of PO. Issue fresh summon to Pws.
Accused Borsing Kathar is present along with his learned counsel.Two pws present .They are examined cross examined and discharged. Issue summon to rest Pws.

Accused person is present and filed a petition praying for adjournment of the case due to absence of his learned counsel and same is accepted.Pws present but couldn&#039t be examined due to absence of defence counsel.Issue fresg summon to Pws.

Accused is absent with step.A petition is also fixed by the petition praying for adjournment on the groundof absence of his learned counsel.PW Misa Mech and banti Chetia are present.Heard learned lawyers of both sides.Cinsidering all aspects,prayer for adjournment is allowed.Accordingly Pws are allowed to go on PR Bond of Rs.100/- each.

Accused Borsing Kather is present.No Pws present.Summon issued to Pws Mina Mech and Banti Chetia are retured after service.The said Pws has informed the court that they are unable to present in court today due to their illness and submitted Doctor certificate.Seen the report.Prayer is allowed.Issue fresh summon to Pws.
Accused Borsing Kathar is present.       PW Smt. Banti Chetia is absent due to illness. Summons issued to PW Smt. Mina Mech returned without proper service. Issue fresh summons to them.
accused present.Smt. Bina Mech is examined cross-examned and discharged

Accused Borsing Kathar is present and vide petition No. 1403/19, prayed for time showing cause of his advocate absence. For the interest of justice prayer is...........................          PW Hari Kt. Nath is present but could not be examined due to defense counsel absence. He is allow to go on PR bond of Rs.100/-. Also issue fresh summons to PWs.

accused absent with step and filed a petition showing cause of his advocate absence.Summon to PW Moni Barman returned wit report that he expired. Further examination against the PW is dispensed with. issue fresh summon to rest  PW
accused present.PW Mrs Banti Chetia is examined cross-examined and discharged. Issue summons to PWs

Accused Sri Borsing Kathar is present. PW Smti Mili Beypi is absent with step and same is allowed. PW Sri Hari Kanta Nath is present. He is allowed to go on peer bond of Rs. 100.           Seen the petition being petition No. 2759/2019 filed by the accused person seeking adjournment on the ground that due to disruption of communication, his engaged counsel could not attend the court. Considering all aspects the prayer is allowed.          Fixing 12.02.2020 for evidence.

CR is received on transfer from court of Hon. Sessions Judge, K/A  fpr disposal.     Accd Borsingh Kathar is absent with step,      PWs absent, summons issued to PWS not returned, issue fresh summons to PWS.
